product_name: The North Face Nimble Jacket - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Nimble Jacket for men loves a scramble up a rock face or trek across an exposed ridge. This super lightweight soft shell resists wind and water and never slows you down.
short_description: The North Face Nimble Jacket for men loves a scramble up a rock face or trek across an exposed ridge. This super lightweight soft shell resists wind and water and never slows you down.
